explains: adv. 空手地；一无所有地

sentences.cn: 抢劫犯一无所获地逃走了。

sentences.en: Delegates from the warring sides held a new round of peace talks but went away empty-handed.
sentences.cn: 交战各方代表举行了新一轮的和谈，但却空手离去。

sentences.en: She visited every Sunday and never arrived empty-handed.
sentences.cn: 她每个星期天都来拜访，没有哪一次不带礼物。
